Description.Text: Domina Home Les Jumeaux is a modern 4-star hotel offering spacious accommodation in the heart of Courmayeur. Highlights include a piano bar, onsite dining and an excellent location close to the ski lifts. Courmayeur is a small town situated in the Aosta Valley. It boasts a prime location at the foot of Mont Blanc, the highest peak in the Alps, making it one of Europe's most desirable ski locations. Its picturesque mountain scenery also makes it a popular summer destination for hikers. Nearby places of interest include the Thermes de Pre Sant-Didier and the famous glacial ski run of the Vallee Blanche. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Courmayeur destinations. The hotel occupies two mid-rise buildings with traditional chalet-style architecture. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Classic rooms are spacious and decorated in a modern style. They feature a private balcony or small garden. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk and en-suite bathroom. The restaurant offers regional and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the stylish piano bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable indoor parking is possible onsite.
